thread.title: NGCP to place Visayas grid on yellow alert on Thursday | ABS-CBN News
thread.title_full: NGCP to place Visayas grid on yellow alert on Thursday | ABS-CBN News

author: ABS-CBN News
title: NGCP to place Visayas grid on yellow alert on Thursday | ABS-CBN News
text: \u003eHigh voltage towers that support transmission lines for electrical power distribution in the Luzon grid are seen from a residential area in Baesa, Quezon City, on Tuesday, May 9, 2023. \u003cem\u003eMaria Tan, ABS-CBN News/File\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eMANILA — The National Grid Corporation of the Philippines will place the Visayas grid on \u0026quot;yellow alert\u0026quot; late Thursday afternoon following an increased demand for power and other persisting problems.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eIn an advisory at 9:30 a.m., NGCP said the Visayas grid would be placed on yellow alert from 5 p.m. to 6 p.m.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eA yellow alert is issued when the operating margin is insufficient to meet the transmission grid\u0026#x27;s contingency requirement, NGCP noted.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cdiv\u003e\u003ca href=\\ \u003eHigh voltage towers that support transmission lines for electrical power distribution in the Luzon grid are seen from a residential area in Baesa, Quezon City, on Tuesday, May 9, 2023. \u003cem\u003eMaria Tan, ABS-CBN News/File\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eMANILA — The National Grid Corporation of the Philippines will place the Visayas grid on \u0026quot;yellow alert\u0026quot; late Thursday afternoon following an increased demand for power and other persisting problems.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eIn an advisory at 9:30 a.m., NGCP said the Visayas grid would be placed on yellow alert from 5 p.m. to 6 p.m.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eA yellow alert is issued when the operating margin is insufficient to meet the transmission grid\u0026#x27;s contingency requirement, NGCP noted.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cdiv\u003e\u003ca href=\\ \u003eHigh voltage towers that support transmission lines for electrical power distribution in the Luzon grid are seen from a residential area in Baesa, Quezon City, on Tuesday, May 9, 2023. \u003cem\u003eMaria Tan, ABS-CBN News/File\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eMANILA — The National Grid Corporation of the Philippines will place the Visayas grid on \u0026quot;yellow alert\u0026quot;
